channel.title: Remove NPC's
channel.description:
I want to make chicken's and cow's and thing's gone.
How do i remove like chicken's and cow's from lumbridge?
Thanks, Keith

item.title: Remove NPC's
item.dc:creator: @elite_expert elite expert
item.description:
@elite_expert wrote:

Or if you go into spawn-npc in cfg folder that’s where all npc’s are so if you do ctrl-f and search for the id of the npc it should have the coords and what u have to do is remove the whole line of coding for that 1 npc

Ex.
Spawn = npcid x y 0 0 0 0 name

Should be like that what ou do is remove all of that then that npc shouldnt be in that position any more

Read full topic

@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Remove them from the spawn handler?
